fusaka_updates.highlight: blob-devnet-0 launched; supernodes not respecting MIN_EPOCHS_FOR_DATA_COLUMN_SIDECARS_REQUESTS (storing 18d vs 1d)
Lighthouse and Prysm need fixes to respect blob retention flag

bal_devnet_2.highlight: bal-devnet-2 targets Wednesday launch with test release 5.1.0
Known blockers: Besu/Nethermind remove gasSpent from Receipt RLP; Geth has 6 BAL bugs
Nimbus-EL: Gloas opcodes activating at Fulu instead of Gloas
EVM fuzz scenarios updated to include slot_num and call stack opcodes

epbs_devnet_0.highlight: EPBS devnet-0 scope changed to target v1.7.0-alpha.2 (moving blob KZG commitments to bid)
All CL teams support alpha-2 scope; simplifies implementation vs alpha-1
Variable PTC deadline PR postponed to post-devnet-0 release
Min builder withdrawability delay lowered to 64 epochs (merged)

glamsterdam_updates.highlight: execution-apis PRs 726/727 add EIP-7928 JSON RPC methods (pending merge)

action_items.action: Merge execution-apis PRs 726 and 727 by Tuesday
Release consensus-specs v1.7.0-alpha.2 for EPBS devnet-0

decisions.decision: EPBS devnet-0 targets alpha-2 spec (includes blob KZG commitments in bid)
Variable PTC deadline postponed to future release (not blocking devnet-0)

targets.target: February 18 - EPBS devnet-0 (tentative, pending alpha-2 implementation)
